homeStepMeetBody: Arrange plans in public places and keep your data protected.
homeCtaTitle: Ready to explore your next city?
homeCtaBody: Start with free tours and meet new people along the way.
aboutMetaDescription: Learn about Wakapadi's mission to connect travelers worldwide.
aboutSubtitle: Wakapadi connects travelers through free walking tours, local insights, and safer meetups.
aboutBodyIntro: Wakapadi was born from a shared passion for authentic travel experiences. Founded in 2023 by a team of globetrotters, we noticed how technology was isolating travelers rather than connecting them.
aboutVisionBody: We believe travel should be about human connections, not just checklists. Our platform bridges the gap between travelers and local communities, creating meaningful interactions that enrich both sides.
aboutVisionListOne: Democratizing travel through free walking tours
aboutJoinBody: Whether you're a traveler seeking authentic experiences or a local wanting to share your city's hidden gems, we'd love to have you onboard. Connect with us at
contactSubtitle: Questions, feedback, or partnerships? We‚Äôd love to hear from you.
loginSubtitle: Log in to chat with travelers, manage your profile, and save tour preferences.
registerSubtitle: Create your account to meet travelers, save tours, and control your visibility.
authErrorRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields.
authErrorAgreeTerms: You must agree to the terms.
authGoogleLoginFailedDetailed: Google login failed. Please try another method.
authAgreeTerms: I agree to the <terms>Terms</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>
authDeprecatedSubtitle: Sign-in has been removed for the first release.
authDeprecatedBody: You are automatically signed in anonymously. Continue browsing from the homepage.
forgotSubtitle: We‚Äôll email you a secure link so you can reset it quickly.
forgotBody: Enter your email and we‚Äôll send you instructions to reset your password.
forgotEmailSent: If your email exists, reset instructions have been sent.
forgotEmailError: Failed to send reset email. Try again.
resetSubtitle: Choose a strong password you don‚Äôt use elsewhere.

privacySubtitle: We keep your data minimal, secure, and under your control.
privacyIntro: At Wakapadi, your privacy is a top priority. We collect only essential information to enhance your experience as you discover free walking tours, connect with fellow travelers, and plan shared adventures around the world.
privacyGdprBody: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have full control over your personal information. If you wish to review, correct, or remove any data we hold, contact us at
privacyRightAccess: ‚Ä¢ Request access to your personal data
privacyRightWithdraw: ‚Ä¢ Withdraw your consent at any time
termsSubtitle: Community rules that keep Wakapadi safe, respectful, and useful.
termsIntroOne: Welcome to Wakapadi ‚Äî a platform that enables travelers and explorers to discover local experiences, join free walking tours, and connect with fellow adventurers in a secure, open environment.
termsIntroTwo: By accessing or using Wakapadi, you agree to abide by our community guidelines and platform terms. These terms may be updated as our features and community evolve.
termsAcceptableBody: Wakapadi promotes a culture of respect, inclusiveness, and exploration. As a user, you must not:
termsAcceptableListFour: ‚Ä¢ Use the platform for commercial solicitation without permission
termsAcceptableFooter: Violating any of these rules may result in account suspension or a permanent ban.
termsUpdatesBody: Wakapadi may revise these Terms of Use periodically. We will notify users of major updates, but we recommend checking this page regularly to stay informed.
cookieSubtitle: We use cookies only to improve your experience and keep things working.
cookieIntro: Wakapadi uses cookies to enhance your experience, store user preferences, improve functionality, and analyze traffic.
cookieEssential: Essential cookies: Necessary for the website to function
cookieAnalytics: Analytics cookies: Help us understand user interactions
